about_the_game:
Star Sonata is a massively multiplayer action based indie role playing space game. Fly your spaceship and team up with and again hundreds of other players while building robot ships, space stations, and colonies to persistently run your empire in your sleep.

Action-based combat and movement


You are in direct control of your ship. Star Sonata is a 3D top down action based game.Use your skill to manually pilot your ship and avoid those laser beams, bullets, and missiles, and line up that perfect shot! Why walk when you can fly?

Build your Empire in a Sandbox style universe


Manage your colonies, build bases, deploy defensive drones, establish trade routes with robot controlled ships. The universe resets every 3-4 months which randomizes the galaxies in player buildable space, creating new conflict where there were once settled borders. You can advance economically by trading between bases, creating your own bases and colonies, killing enemies, collecting Player versus Player (PVP) bounties, or completing one of the 2000 missions. There are thousands of different items that can be obtained or constructed and sold to other players.

Become Emperor of the Universe


You can “win” the game by declaring yourself emperor and fighting for influence with your team in the Anatolian Expanse PvP zone. You can partake in large scale PVP conflicts with hundreds of players, or even little skirmishes on fringe systems.

Progress


Star Sonata includes a wide variety of skills and customization options including eight classes, four trade skills, 127 total skills that give various stat increases that the players can train, over 250 player obtainable ships, the ability to change nearly every aspect of your ship’s build including the engine, weapons, energy, shield, and more! In Star Sonata no two players will play the game the same way and no two players will have the exact same build!

Indie Development Team


We are a small independent development team and we pour our hearts and souls into Star Sonata. It's a labor of love, and we hope you like it as much as we do. One global server, one amazing community - Star Sonata does not separate the community based on region, everyone plays on the same server. Play as long as you like for free, and with no level limit! An optional subscription is required for some content, but most of the game is available without a subscription.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 32bit cpu, dual core 2ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 920 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c

short_description: Star Sonata 2 is a space sandbox MMO that combines elements of action, RPG, and empire creation into a truly unique MMO. Explore the sandbox style universe, build persistent bases, construct trade ships, and even fight your way to the top and claim the Emperor’s Throne!
